snippet: The Carlyle Group, the large private equity firm, indicated that it might sell 10 percent of its shares in its initial public offering, a disclosure buried on page 197 of its revised prospectus.
abstract: The Carlyle Group, the large private equity firm, indicated that it might sell 10 percent of its shares in its initial public offering, a disclosure buried on page 197 of its revised prospectus.

headline.main: In Footnote, Carlyle Hints at Size of I.P.O.
